title: The #1 Question Asked In The Cigar Shop
itunes:title: The #1 Question Asked In The Cigar Shop
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe… It’s the #1 Question asked in Cigar Shop’s across America and today we answer that question as we look at what’s new!  We take a look at the cigars that have just come out or are due to come out this year. New brands, sizes, and lines we have them all.

 

In the first hour we look at one of those cigars as we fire up the Henry Clay War Hawk Rebellious as we share a public service announcement to manufacturers and retailers.

 

In the second hour we fire up the new Perdomo 10th Anniversary Maduro and we continue the discussion on new cigars and also discuss our experience at two traveling road shows here in New England that have taken place in lieu of PCA.

 

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Email of the Week and Barry returns with a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
